heroTitle: Explore, Analyze, and Understand Environmental Data
heroSubtitle: Our platform offers advanced tools for visualizing and correlating biodiversity datasets, empowering research and conservation efforts.
feature1Desc: Visualize complex data with selectable layers for land use, vegetation, and water bodies on a dynamic map.
feature2Desc: Access real-time graphs and indicators for any selected area, and export your findings as a PDF.
feature3Desc: Leverage AI to automatically find correlations when new datasets are added, keeping your insights up-to-date.
loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your dashboard.
biodiversityDesc: Interact with our globe to explore priority areas for conservation and understand the geographic distribution of biodiversity. Rotate and zoom to discover insights about different regions.
errorToastMetadata: Could not load general overview information.
generalOverviewError: Could not load general overview data.
landCoverTooltip: Distribution of land use in the selected area.
futureClimateTooltip: Temperature and precipitation projections for the selected area.
biodiversityTooltip: Average number of species in the selected area.
carbonTooltip: Analysis of carbon stock and valuation of carbon services.
waterError: Could not load water valuation data.
aiCorrelatorDescription: Describe a new environmental dataset to see how it correlates with existing data and get suggestions for updates.
aiCorrelatorNewPlaceholder: E.g., 'Weekly Sentinel-2 satellite images showing vegetation stress levels in the Amazon basin for Q2 2024.'
aiCorrelatorInsightsTooltip: AI's analysis of how the new data connects with existing information and visualizations.
aiCorrelatorSuggestionsTooltip: AI's recommendations for new charts or modifications to current visualizations.
aiCorrelatorExistingVisualizations: Bar chart of land use, progress bars for water quality and vegetation index.
aiCorrelatorExistingInsights: Correlation between mining and deforestation. Resilience of water sources in protected areas.
aiCorrelatorErrorToast: Failed to run AI correlation. Please try again.
mapSettingsFill: Region in the center of the shape
reportSelectArea: Select an area on the dashboard to see the report.
mapPopupSelectTerritory: Please select a territory where the layers are active.
mapPopupError: Error fetching location data. Please try again.
welcomeDescription: This platform presents the quantification of environmental services and the detection of priority areas for restoration in the Amazon based on three pillars: (i) valuation of environmental services of terra firme forests related to carbon, biodiversity, and water; (ii) suggestion of key species to be used in restoration, which can increase the resilience of forests to future climate changes and provide economic benefits for local communities; and (iii) integration of traditional knowledge with western science.
publicAccessFeature1: Visualization of data layers and general information on the interactive map.
publicAccessFeature2: Access to a limited set of data and statistics for selected areas.
loggedInAccessFeature1: Full access to all scientific data, including time series and detailed analyses.
loggedInAccessFeature2: Ability to save your areas of interest, viewing history, and custom settings.
